name: Negative Space (itch) (Mavryke)
description:
My first fully functional game, enjoy! 

'Negative Space' is a hard as nails endless survival game. It was developed for the Fun Jam (10/05/2020) in 72 hours. I streamed almost all of it at https://www.facebook.com/Mavryke & https://www.twitch.tv/mavryke .

If people show interest in this proof of concept I may develop the game further. Maybe a swashbuckling campaign, ship customization, improved varied combat, some slapping songs for each level... yeah that'd be nice.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------

Known issues (please notify me if you find something, even if subjective), Keep in mind that I literally did not have time to fix these.

-Some players struggle with getting their bearings in 3D space

-The game is too hard for some players

-The kill counter acts up

-Stuff hangs around for a few seconds after exploding

-The game can sometimes crash from particle effects randomly

-Enemies can spawn behind the player

-The camera position resets itself to preserve an "up" direction

-The options in the options menu are fake
